Text: Tariff Updates December doctype html public wcdtd html transitionalen html All Tariff Book Holders brnbsp pRe Revisions to TransCanadas Transportation Tariff brnbsp pTransCanada has updated the following sections of the Mainline Transportation Tariff pnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp TABLE OF CONTENTS brnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp LIST OF TOLLS brnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp INTERRUPTIBLE TRANSPORTATION TOLL SCHEDULE brnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbspnbsp TURNBACK PROCEDURE pThese amendments were proposed in the TransCanada application concerning tolls and tariff issues Tolls Application and the Mainline Service and Pricing Settlement Settlement The Board considered the Tolls Application at a public hearing and RH Reasons for Decisionnbsp approval by the National Energy Board was dated November pAccordinglynbsp new versions of the Table of Contents List of Tolls IT Toll Schedule and Turnback Procedure pages are available online at brTransCanadas website at a hrefanbsp or through NrG atnbsp a hrefa pIf you have any questions please contact me by email atnbsp or by telephone at br brnbsp pTim Wells brAnalyst brnbsp brnbsp brnbsphtml
